amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the total amount appropriated by 1%, with exceptions for Military personnel accounts and health care programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 317 (Roll no. 396).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 317 (Roll no. 396).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
